tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My first Visit for a dental problem and I was a satisfied person when I left the clinic, I had visited for severe pain touching my brain nerve from the left teeths. Dr Varun diagnostics skills are marvelous he quickly got to the target from where it was arising ofcourse x rays helped out. 
Overall I had a very good experience visiting Dr Varun Parikh and hope his treatment gives me a long term closure of this issue

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Always a good experience with Dr Varun & Dr Neha . They take a lot of care with regards to before & after treatment which is really very good

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
very proficient, comforting and friendly doctor with the latest techiniques and equipment to get a very good final outcome.

in my case, a root canal was a possibility but doctor realized that a root canal wasnt needed and saved the tooth,  so that was a big win knowing the doctor your best interest in mind. And the final execution of the prodecure was also seamless, painless, done with full empathy and patience with consideration of patient in mind.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Varuns approach with explaining the issue and executing the treatment is 10/10. This was my first ever visit and I was already super stressed but after the treatment my impression about dental treatment changed completely and I am already feeling so much better already.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Sheer Quality all the way. And to top it all off there is Trustworthiness ( very rare these days right ). You simply cannot ask for more. Thank you Varun Sir. An unforgettable treatment. Lovely pair of hands. The go-to Dentist for people seeking quality in their treatment. Thanks again.

Love,
Ajit

review: ******** *** ******* **** ****** Dr.Neha helped me get through my gagging issue throughout the entire treatment by talking to me and giving me short breaks every now and then. They were both very kind and helpful. Thanks to both of them for a great dental experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Both Dr.Varun and Dr.Neha were super friendly and kept explaining every procedure along the way. The treatment was painless and anxiety-free. They are a stellar team and make the entire dental experience comfortable. Thanks to both.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: The best Dental experience I had in Sion. The Clinic is well done up, neat and hygienic. Dr Varun & Neha are thorough professionals and understand your case well with careful treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Appointment time given was perfect and to the point diagnosis was done. Doctor explained in detail prevention and future damage consequences if ignored. Overall a painless experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Varun was extremely warm and friendly during the whole process. He explained how the entire procedure works and the importance of Oral hygiene. 
I was very happy with the cleanliness and the brand new machines at the clinic.
The staff here are welcoming, friendly and made me feel at ease before, during and after the procedure.
Dr. Varun is thorough, calming and informative

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: Dr. Varun Parikh makes sure the patient knows what he is doing/ going to do. You are made aware of the cause of the dental problem and he also provides valuable inputs to prevent it from happening again. He also understands when the patient is even slightly uncomfortable by any pain/ pressure. He will keep you distracted from any pain by engaging in relevant topics that would interest you. All in all good experience.

tags: None
review: Dr. Varun Parikh has great expertise as an Orthodontist. My child was extremely comfortable as she was under him for the last 1yr 6months. His appointments are well schedule as there is no waiting hence no waste of time. His charges are affordable and not exuberant. He handles his patient with good amount of patience and care. Very hygienic with all his tool kits used during the entire procedure.Would certainly recommend Dr Varun.
